title: Fool Me Once, Shame on You, Fool Me Twice, I Punch Your Face!
description: If you can fool host Mitsuru Shinehara twice and complete the challenge, you win the mystery prize! If time runs out or you surrender, you get a punch in the face! Can you survive Baka Blitz, Bumper Ballz, Sumo Slide, Death Tube, Buttock Shock, Rhino Giddy Up, or The Gutinator? Find out!
altHero: Mitsuru Shinehara with his arm around a contestant and his fist in the air
alt1: Announcer Bot in front of the studio audience
alt2: contestant jumping across tall platforms shaped like sushi
alt3: contestant covered in wasabi getting a punch in the face
alt4: contestant staring down the Terror Taikos, a long catwalk with huge drums swinging back and forth
tags: game shows with a bit of danger!
